text:

```json
{
  "explanation": "The description refers to storing low precision geolocation data, specifically country and city. This is closely related to the purpose of personalisation within services or product activities, as geolocation information can be used to customise experiences based on location. The term 'Service Personalisation' fits this context well. 'Personalisation' as a broad category is also relevant, but more specific to service personalisation. Additionally, 'User Interface Personalisation' could apply if the geolocation data is being used to customize the interface presented to the user.",
  "results": [14, 62, 68],
  "unmatchedConcepts": []
}
```
